name: Missing Persons
description:
Experience the best indie horror-survival game with Missing Persons.

As a fellow officer interrogate people, collect information, uncover the truth and bring responsible to justice. Investigate every place you go to find clues that might lead you to a solution. During your journey, you will encounter many threats. Always be cautious and pay attention to details. Even though you are a cop you are not a superhuman. You are free to talk to locals and investigate any place you want. You will always encounter a small clue even when you don't expect to. Not all the locals will be friendly and not all the clues will be trustworthy. It is up to you to believe or not and make choices depending on your beliefs. If you miss enough clues or make enough wrong choices you might end up in a way you don't want to.

Key Features



First-Person Action Game: See the game from the character's view and experience the thrill and the horror firsthand.

Talk / Interrogate: Talk to characters and gather information about people and places.

Combat: You are authorized to use deadly force if needed, but be careful with your ammo.

Loot: Make sure to loot every place you go. There will always be something to help you with your journey.

Notes: Find and inspect notes to find the secrets behind them.

Craft: Sometimes when situations go dire you can always craft required items if you have enough materials to craft them.
